text: Theresa Lee "Terry" Farrell (born November 19, 1963) is an American actress and fashion model. She played Regina "Reggie" Kostas in the television show Becker. She acted in Star Trek: Deep Space Nine. Farrell appeared on the Italian and German editions of Vogue. She later appeared in editorials of American Vogue. Farrell retired from acting to concentrate on her family. Farrell was born in Cedar Rapids, Iowa. ==References== Category:1963 births Category:American television actors Category:American movie actors Category:Models from Iowa Category:Actors from Cedar Rapids, Iowa Category:Living people
title: Terry Farrell
